definitions.definition: The act of pressing clothes with an iron , such as a steam iron .
Laundry that has been washed and is ready to be ironed.
examples: I really should make a start on the ironing soon.

definitions.definition: Laundry that has recently been ironed.
examples: I really should put the ironing away.

main_definition: The act of pressing clothes with an iron , such as a steam iron .
secondary_definitions: Laundry that has been washed and is ready to be ironed.
Laundry that has recently been ironed.
